title: SBP Digital Trust Consulting Launches Website
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/24/2015 @ 1:30 PM   SAFE-BioPharma 
TEANECK, N.J. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- The new website for SBP Digital Trust Consulting is a resource for biopharmaceutical managers seeking expert guidance for a range of IT issues, including establishing secure global collaborations, improving workflows, and meeting international regulatory IT requirements. The site lists a selection of prominent security, identity and access management (IAM) and technology consultants serving the biopharmaceutical and related industries. 
Each of the individuals on the site has extensive experience within the biopharmaceutical industry. Their expertise includes cyber-security, IAM system design and development, and IAM policy and compliance with US and EU standards (NIST, ISO, ETSI, EC). 
Among other services, they are available to consult in development of IAM system requirements, token, certificate and credential policies and lifecycle management, conversion of Trial Master Files to electronic formats, and improving electronic laboratory notebook technologies. 
SBP Digital Trust Consulting was recently established by SAFE-BioPharma Association , the global digital identity management and digital signature standard. SAFE-BioPharma is the major Trust Framework Provider in the drug development and healthcare industries. The SAFE-BioPharma Trust Framework is recognized by the US Government's FPKI and FICAM programs, the US FDA, the US DEA, the European Medicines Agency (EMA), and the European Telecommunications Standards Institute (ETSI). 
About SAFE-BioPharma 
For more information on the SAFE-BioPharma standard for digital identity and digital signatures used in life science and healthcare settings, visit http://www.safe-biopharma.org .
